system.description:
As a limited action, artificers can imbue powers into objects or constructs, including @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-abilities.Item.anNvwvvbyIlESkm5]{living constructs}, as infusions by channeling and manipulating raw magical energy into the target. Infusions with a Duration measured in rounds instead are measured in minutes.

  • Maintaining Powers: Artificers cannot maintain a power at the end of the powerâ€™s Duration.

  • Limitations: Artificer infusions all have a range of Touch. Powers that normally have a range greater than Touch or are available with only one aspect such as boost Trait or light benefit from applying these @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp04arcana.JournalEntryPage.04trappings00000#limitations]{Limitations}.

  • Single Targets: Infusions may not use the Additional Recipients Modifier.
